# NWConnection.EstablishmentReport.Handshake

**Structure**

A description of a single protocol handshake.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Handshake
```

## Measuring Performance

- **handshakeDuration**: The duration of the protocol handshake.
- **handshakeRTT**: The round-trip time the protocol observed during its handshake.

## Identifying Protocols

- **definition**: The protocol performing the handshake.

## Inspecting Protocol Handshakes

- **handshakes**: The array of protocol handshakes in order from first completed to last completed.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
